author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: Boeing, Twitter, Comcast, Wynn, Texas Instruments, Northrop Grumman, Anthem
text: Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Wednesday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. —Up 2.7%: Boeing boosted key financial guidance for 2018, a sign the aerospace company isn’t being affected by supply-chain issues and broader concerns over the impact of shifting global trade policies. —Up 2.5%: The social-media firm New Worry for Stock Investors: Are Corporate Earnings Peaking?
